Class Cli

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.ClientGameManager
it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.Cli
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientUpdateListener, DisconnectionListener, Runnable
public class Cli extends ClientGameManager implements DisconnectionListener
This class is used to manage the cli
